examples.body: Question for the christians in here: Since force conversion, expulsion, collective punishment and killing are all against the core Christian belief… what’s the solution for the Muslims?

The Robbie Harvey : · Man Sentenced To Life For SA'ing 10-Year-Old Girl. A 23-year-old man from Lucedale, Mississippi, named Justin Andrew Busby, was sentenced to life in prison after being convicted of sexually abusing a 10-year-old girl during a family vacation in Destin, Florida. The victim did not immediately disclose the abuse but later reported it to her parents after the family returned to Mississippi, according to the State Attorney's Office. Busby was arrested in May 2023 following an investigation by the Lucedale Police Department. During questioning, he did not deny the allegations but attempted to minimize his actions. Busby, who was over 18 at the time of the offense and described as a trusted family member to the victim, was found guilty by a jury of sexual battery of a victim under 12 years old. Circuit Judge David Oberliesen imposed the life sentence. In addition to the Florida conviction, Busby faces charges in George County, Mississippi, including one count of sexual battery of a victim under 14 and two counts of lustful touching of a minor, according to WLBT and George County Assistant District Attorney George Huffman. These allegations stem from incidents reportedly occurring in Mississippi, and Huffman noted that an 8-year-old child has also accused Busby of sexual abuse. 3 comments

Fight For a Better Tomorrow: We Won’t Back Down : · BREAKING: ICE Officer admits to raping woman in custody for months in exchange for seeing her daughter￼ Prosecutors say he would bring the victim letters and pictures of her daughter, along with food and other gifts, which is against ICE rules.￼ David is said to have hired lookouts while he raped the woman in a janitorial closet. Initially, David denied the accusations before confessing during an interview in September.￼ He was released on a $10,000 bond and will be sentenced on April 10* where his charge carries a maximum of 15 years in prison and a fine of up to $250,000.￼ David Courvelle, 56, pled guilty to sexually assaulting a Nicaraguan woman over the course of several months at a Louisiana ICE detention facility.￼ This isn't an isolated case. It's just the only one caught so far.

 brother you need a reading comprehension course. The assumption is you thinking the Bible will cover everything when it is guidelines like do not hurt a child, do not commit sexual misconduct, etc. You know what the Bible also doesn't say?
